dependencies.summary: GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and applications written in C. It provides the core object system used in GNOME, the main loop implementation, and a large set of utility functions for strings and common data structures.
dependencies.name: glib2

dependencies.summary: NumPy is the fundamental package for array computing with Python.
dependencies.name: numpy

dependencies.summary: Wrapper package for OpenCV python bindings.
dependencies.name: opencv-python-headless
